New blog with Contentful as a headless CMS

This is my attempted at creating a content for a blog page using contentful. So far this is very simple, just like strapi. I may even like this better because its not only a headless CMS but also a standard CMS. Also, its free, unlike strapi where my free subscription ends in 13 days lol.

 2024-11-07 myblog
Strapi Implementation

This post explains how to set up and retrieve blog data using two popular headless CMS platforms, Strapi and Contentful. It covers the process of structuring collections, integrating JavaScript to fetch content securely, and showcasing how the blogs appear when powered by each platform. This guide provides a straightforward comparison to help you understand their setup and functionality.

 2024-11-22 writeUps
Headless CMS Systems: Overview and Comparison

This write-up explores different headless CMS platforms and compares their features to understand their practical applications in modern web development. The purpose is to identify how each CMS caters to various project needs, balancing factors like customization, scalability, and ease of use. By evaluating CMS options such as Strapi, Contentful, Sanity, Prismic, and Ghost, I aimed to determine the best tools for specific scenarios, emphasizing their strengths and limitations. The comparison highlights the importance of CMS selection in streamlining workflows and achieving efficient content management solutions.

 2024-11-19 writeUps
Templating Languages

This lab write-up explores various templating languages and their role in modern web development. The goal was to understand how these tools streamline static site generation (SSG) and enhance flexibility, simplicity, and performance. This exercise also included learning about 11ty’s configuration options and the significance of organizing file structures effectively. By comparing popular templating engines and their features, I gained insights into selecting the right tools for different project needs.
